configuration.tip_port: Enter port number, which will be opened for incoming and outgoing connections.
configuration.tip_password: Set password for admin user (Icecast Web Service) and to authorize stream sources.
configuration.tip_ices0: Ices0 is a local MP3 streaming utility. When it's enabled, user is able to listening favorite MP3 music collection from anyplace. Music generated from playlist will be broadcasted through Icecast server.
configuration.tip_reencode: Donâ€™t use this feature on a TS-109/209/409 series (slower CPU).
configuration.tip_restart_server_1: If all settings are correct, simply push Save button to save all settings. Save button will not restart Icecast server, so whole settings still will not be applied.
configuration.tip_restart_server_2: If You want to apply any settings, always push Restart Icecast buton after Save button - this will restart Icecast server with new settings.
